sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">534ad6883b6e3a10bc1ccdd643e45ac7</macroponent><name>stylized_text_13/now_default/text</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  const peopleList = api.data.look_up_people.results;
  const peopleSysId = api.item.value;
  const people = peopleList.find(item => item._row_data.uniqueValue === peopleSysId);
  const title = people.title.displayValue;
  const firstName = people.first_name_th.displayValue;
  const lastName = people.last_name_th.displayValue;
	return `${title} ${firstName} ${lastName}`.trim();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-21 10:08:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>1dbf9cc23b2ef650bc1ccdd643e45ac2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_13/now_default/text</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BOT Application" source="x_1896436_bot_ap_0">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BOT Application">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1dbf9cc23b2ef650bc1ccdd643e45ac2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-21 10:08:33</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
